resources.string: Individual\nThis type of user is for people who commutes a lot and goes to a establishments
Driver\nThis type of user is for people who works on a transportation vehicle
Individual\nThis type of user is for people who owns an establishment
- This user can add employees to scan the customer QR Code when entering in the establishment.

- You can see the list of the Employees who are currently active.
 - You can add an employee by clicking ADD EMPLOYEE button.
 - You can even deactivate/activate an account by clicking the DEACTIVATE/ ACTIVATE EMPLOYEE there you can select if you want to deactivate/activate an employee
 - You can activate the employee scanner and QR Code by clicking their name on the list.
 - When the account of employee is activated for scanning, they can scan the customer QR Code, they can even generate a QR Code for the customers to scan by simply setting their Information Details on the Kebab Menu.
- You can edit your Establishment Details.\n - You can change your account password by clicking the ACCOUNT tab.
- You can see the list of the customers that have been scanned by your employee.\n - You can see the list of the total numbers of your employees have scanned by clicking the COUNTS tab.
- This user can scan the generated QR Codes of the passengers and can even set the vehicle of what they want to use.

- You can add a vehicle by clicking the add vehicle and input the details.
 - You can select the vehicle that you have registered on the plate number and it will display the details.
 - After you have set the vehicle that you have choose, you can now scan the QR Codes of the passengers.
- You can edit your Information Details that will generate as a QR Code.\n - You can change your account password by clicking the ACCOUNT tab.\n
- You can see the list of the passengers that you have scanned on the vehicle that you have choose.\n
- This user can generate their own QR Code for traveling and entering establishment.
- It can generate a QR Code by setting your destination and you can even add a companion.

- It can Generate a QR Code and can add a companion for the employees to scan before you enter.\n - You can even scan the QR Code of the establishments using the scan button before you enter if want to.\n
- You can edit your Information Details that will generate as a QR Code. - You can change your account password by clicking the ACCOUNT tab.
- You can check the list of your destination in travel history.\n - You can check your visited establishment by clicking the ESTABLISHMENT tab.
